feedback#top_para_1.message: لطفا ما را در جریان کیفیت عملکرد سایفون بذارید تا بتوانیم این برنامه را بهتر کنیم.
feedback#top_para_1.description: Text motivating the user to send Psiphon Inc. feedback.

settings#local-proxy-ports#error-modal-b.message:
You have configured Psiphon to use a specific local port for its HTTP proxy.
However, that port appears to be already in use and so Psiphon cannot use it.

Please change the configured HTTP proxy port value and try again. We recommended that you clear the value so that Psiphon can automatically pick an available port.
settings#local-proxy-ports#error-modal-b.description: Main text in the 'Local Proxy Port Conflict' dialog box. This is shown when the conflict is with the HTTP proxy port, rather than the SOCKS proxy port.

settings#upstream-proxy#set-both-error-m.message: You must set both Hostname and Port, or leave both blank for automatic selection.
settings#upstream-proxy#set-both-error-m.description: Error message that is shown if the user enters a value for one of 'Upstream Hostname' or 'Upstream Port', but not for both -- this is not valid, as both are required. Alternatively, the user can leave both blank to allow the automatic behaviour.

settings#egress-region#select-jp.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in Japan will be used.

settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.message:
You have configured Psiphon to use an "upstream proxy".
However, we seem to be unable to connect to a Psiphon server through that proxy.
Please fix the settings and try again.
settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.description: Main text in the 'Upstream Proxy Error' dialog box. This is shown when the user has directly altered these settings, and those settings are (probably) erroneous.

settings#error-alert.message: خطا! لطفا مقادیر نادرست قبل از اقدام را حل کنند.
settings#error-alert.description: This alert is shown to the user if they enter incorrect values into one or more of the settings fields.

messages#show-debug-label.description: Label on a checkbox. If the user checks it, debug log messages will be shown to the user.

banner#sponsored-by.description: Text appears above the sponsor banner image. So it kind of reads 'Sponsored by BBC' (for example).

connection#connected-msg.description: Message in the big connection status box telling the user that Psiphon is currently connected to the network.

messages#placeholder.description: Placeholder text shown when there are not yet any log messages to show. This message is removed when the first log message is added.

nav#settings.description: Text on the tab that, if the user clicks on it, switches to the 'Settings' view. In that view the user can change the settings/options that change how Psiphon works.

settings#egress-region#error-modal-title.description: Title text of the error modal dialog shown when it is detected that the user has an invalid 'Psiphon Server Region' currently configured.

settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-titl.description: Title of the message box showing the error message when a problem is detected with the user's 'upstream proxy settings'.

connection#stopping-msg.message: سایفون در حال قطع شدن است ...
connection#stopping-msg.description: Message in the big connection status box telling the user that Psiphon is currently trying to disconnect from the network.

settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.message:
Psiphon is currently configured to use your system proxy as its "upstream proxy".
However, we seem to be unable to connect to a Psiphon server through that proxy.
Please enable "Don't use upstream proxy" and try again.
settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.description: Main text in the 'Upstream Proxy Error' dialog box. This is shown when the user has not directly altered these settings (yet), but the default is causing a problem.

feedback#success-message.description: Message shown to user after their feedback has been sent successufully

settings#split-tunnel#help-text.message: اگر فعال باشد٬ درخواست به سرورهای داخل کشورشما از طریق سرورهای سایفون تونل نمی‌شوند.
settings#split-tunnel#help-text.description: Text explaining to the user what the 'Split Tunnel' setting does if enabled.

about#visit-download-site.message: To download a new version of Psiphon, or to get help and more information, please visit the website.
about#visit-download-site.description: Paragraph on the 'About' page telling users what web page to go to get a new version of Psiphon or more info about it.

settings#upstream-proxy#skip-label.description: Label for the checkbox that allows the user to override the default 'upstream proxy' usage and totally disable the feature.

settings#upstream-proxy#port-label.description: Label for the text box where the user can set the network port number for the 'upstream proxy' that they would like to use.

settings#port-value-error-msg.description: Error text that appears when the user enters an invalid network port number. As indicated, a valid port number must be a number between 1 and 65535, inclusive. This text is not visible until an invalid value is entered.

nav#feedback.description: Text on the tab that, if the user clicks on it, switches to the 'Feeback' view. In that view the user can send feedback about their experience to Psiphon.

connection#starting-msg.description: Message in the big connection status box telling the user that Psiphon is currently trying to connect to the network.

settings#applying-message.message: اتصال مجدد برای درخواست تنظیمات شما .
settings#applying-message.description: Pop-up message shown to users after they have changed their settings and a reconnection is happening to apply the new settings.

settings#egress-region#select-us.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in the United States will be used.

feedback#top_para_2.message: بیشتر مشکلات سایفون با دانلود جدیدترین نسخه برطرف می‌شوند. جدیدترین نسخه سایفون را با کلیک روی این لینک دانلود کنید. جدیدترین نسخه را با فرستادن ایمیل به آدرس نیز میتوانید دریافت کنید.
feedback#top_para_2.description: Text telling the user that downloading a new version of Psiphon may be beneficial, and how to get a new version.

settings#local-proxy-ports#error-modal-b.message:
You have configured Psiphon to use a specific local port for its SOCKS proxy.
However, that port appears to be already in use and so Psiphon cannot use it.

Please change the configured SOCKS proxy port value and try again. We recommended that you clear the value so that Psiphon can automatically pick an available port.
settings#local-proxy-ports#error-modal-b.description: Main text in the 'Local Proxy Port Conflict' dialog box. This is shown when the conflict is with the SOCKS proxy port, rather than the HTTP proxy port.

feedback#submit_button.description: Submit button text. If the user clicks it, their feedback will be sent to Psiphon Inc.

settings#local-proxy-ports#socks-label.description: Label for the text box where the user will enter their desired local port for the Psiphon SOCKS process. The full term for this would be 'Desired SOCKS local proxy port', but is shortened. 'SOCKS' is a proxy protocol. Any user for whom this setting is useful will know what that means.

feedback#top_para_3.message: شما می‌توانید جواب بیشتر مشکلات رایج را در قسمت سوال و جواب متداول پیدا کنید.
feedback#top_para_3.description: Text telling the user how to get to the Psiphon FAQ.

settings#saved-message.description: Pop-up message shown to users after they have changed their settings (but they aren't currently connected, so there's no reconnect or further action).

about#get-by-email.message: اگر وبسایت در دسترس شما نیست٬ نسخه جدید سایفون را میتوانید با فرستادن ایمیل به این آدرس دریافت کنید:
about#get-by-email.description: Paragraph on the 'About' page telling users that they can also get a new version of Psiphon via email. The text in this resource is then followed by an email address.

settings#egress-region#select-nl.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in the Netherlands will be used.

general#modal-close-button.description: Text in the button that dismisses a modal dialog. It is often the only button (no 'OK' or 'Cancel', etc.).

settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.message: در اینجا اطلاعات خطای فنی است :
settings#upstream-proxy#error-modal-body.description: Preamble before the technical error message is shown in the 'Upstream Proxy Error' dialog box. This is generated within the code and may not be very user-friendly (but it may be necessary for the user to figure out what's wrong).

settings#local-proxy-ports#http-label.description: Label for the text box where the user will enter their desired local port for the Psiphon HTTP/HTTPS process. The full term for this would be 'Desired HTTP and HTTPS local proxy port', but is shortened.

settings#reset-button.message: تنظیم مجدد به حالت پیش فرض
settings#reset-button.description: Text on the button that resets the Psiphon settings values to default. This will typically be pressed if the user has configured something incorrectly and needs to get back to the default state.

about#head.description: The title at the top of the 'About' page. It is the application name and slogan. 'Psiphon' can be translated or transliterated if appropriate for you language. 'Beyond Borders' is the slogan that is also used on the Psiphon website -- it is meant to suggest that Psiphon can help users to get to the internet beyond the border (firewall) of the country they live in. If appropriate for your language, it should be in all capital letters.

settings#upstream-proxy#heading.description: Settings section heading. In this section the user can specify network information to use an 'upstream proxy', which is a separate proxy that Psiphon will connect through to get to its own server. This is most often used by people in school or work networks that force them to connect out to the Internet through a particular server. This setting can also disable automatic upstream proxy use.

settings#egress-region#help-text.message: سایفون در کشورهای مختلفی سرور دارد. برای سریعترین سرعت اتصال گزینه «بهترین سرور» را انتخاب کنید. شما میتوانید سروری در کشور مورد نظر خود را نیز انتخاب کنید.
settings#egress-region#help-text.description: Help text below the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. It explains to the user what the setting does and what the default (and best) option is.

settings#vpn-incompatible-msg.description: If 'VPN mode' is enabled, this text is displayed under or beside settings which are incompatible with VPN mode and have been disabled because of it. It is intended to let the user know why the setting has been disabled.

settings#local-proxy-ports#unique-error-.message: Local ports must be distinct from each other.
settings#local-proxy-ports#unique-error-.description: Error message that shows if the HTTP local proxy port and SOCKS local proxy port are set to a value and are the same as each other. The local ports must be different from each other. Or one or both of the fields can be empty, which means 'automatic selection'.

settings#vpn-incompatible-label.description: If 'VPN mode' is enabled, this text shows up in a label beside the Settings sections which are incompatible with VPN mode. It is intended to draw the user's attention to the fact that some of the other settings have become disabled.

settings#local-proxy-ports#heading.description: Settings section heading. In this section the user can specify what network ports the local Psiphon processes should use (Psiphon uses two such ports). For most people, this should be set to automatic.

settings#egress-region#select-de.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in Germany will be used.

nav#connection.description: Text on the tab that, if the user clicks on it, switches to the 'Connection' view, that has the connect button

connection#stop-btn.description: Text on the big connection button telling the user that if they click it, they will stop trying to connect to the network. This is shown to the user when they are trying to connect.

settings#egress-region#error-modal-body-.message:
You have configured Psiphon to use a server in a specific region.
However, that region is no longer available.
You must choose a new region or change to the default "Best Performance" choice.
settings#egress-region#error-modal-body-.description: Descriptive body text of the error modal dialog shown when it is detected that the user has an invalid 'Psiphon Server Region' currently configured.

feedback#text_feedback_bottom_para.message: اگر فرم بالا کار نمی‌کند و می‌خواهید برای ما عکس از صفحه‌ خودتون بفرستید. می‌توانید آن را به آدرس feedback@psiphon.ca ایمیل کنید.
feedback#text_feedback_bottom_para.description: Message showing the user an email they can use to contact Psiphon Inc.

settings#local-proxy-ports#error-modal-t.description: Title of the message box showing the error message when it is detected that the user has chosen a local proxy port (either HTTP or SOCKS) that is already in use and therefore can't be used by Psiphon.

connection#disconnect-btn.description: Text on the big connection button telling the user that if they click it, they will be disconnected from the network. This is shown when the user is currently connected.

feedback#top_content_title.message: نظرات خود را با ما در میان بگذارید

banner#long-connecting.message:
Oh no! You seem to be having trouble connecting!
Download the latest version of Psiphon from the download site or by sending an email to
banner#long-connecting.description: Message that appears when Psiphon is having trouble connecting. Often such connection problems can be fixed by downloading a new version.

connection#stopped-msg.description: Message in the big connection status box telling the user that Psiphon is currently not connected to the network.

nav#about.description: Text on the tab that, if the user clicks on it, switches to the 'About' view. In that view the user can see info about the app, info about Psiphon Inc., and click links for more information.

settings#local-proxy-ports#leave-blank.message: برای انتخاب پورت های اتوماتیک خالی بگذارید(توصیه می شود).
settings#local-proxy-ports#leave-blank.description: Help text that appears above the 'Local Proxy Ports' settings. It indicates what the default/best option is (blank, automatic).

language#success-message.description: A welcome message shown to the user when they first switch to the correct UI language

settings#egress-region#select-sg.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in Singapore will be used.

feedback#diagnostic_check.message: آپلود و ارسال اطلاعات فنی/تشخیصی برنامه. لطفا به خاطر داشته باشید که این اطلاعات به هیچ عنوان هویت شما را آشکار نمی‌کند، و به ما کمک می‌کند که سایفون کارکرد بهتری داشته باشد. اینجا کلیک کنید تا ببینید ما چه اطلاعاتی را جمع آوری می‌کنیم.
feedback#diagnostic_check.description: Checkbox text. If it is checked, diagnostic information about Psiphon's status will be sent along with the feedback to Psiphon Inc.

settings#transport-mode#heading.description: Settings section heading. In this section the user can choose to use an alternative connection and data transfer method -- also known as 'transport'.

about#description.message: سایفون یک نرم افزار عبور از فیلترینگ «فیلترشکن» است. سایفون برای ایجاد دسترسی به اینترنت باز٬ برای عبور از سانسور و فایروال ها ساخته شده است. در ضمن سایفون یک پروژه «اپن سورس» است و با عشق در تورنتو نوشته شده است.
about#description.description: Paragraph on the 'About' page telling users generally what Psiphon is.

settings#split-tunnel#heading.description: Settings section heading. If the user clicks this, the 'Split Tunnel' section will expand and can be edited. If 'split tunnel' is enabled, if the user is trying to get to a website in his/her own country, they will connect to it directly, instead of through Psiphon.

settings#egress-region#invalid-error-msg.message: یک منطقه سرور معتبر سایفون را انتخاب کنید.
settings#egress-region#invalid-error-msg.description: Error message that is visible when the 'Psiphon Server Region' setting is invalid or not yet set.

settings#transport-mode#check-label.description: Label for the checkbox that allows the user to indicate that they want to use the non-default network transport mode. This mode is generally inferior for circumvention and not recommended.

nav#messages.description: Text on the tab that, if the user clicks on it, switches to the 'Log Messages' view. In that view the user can see the status messages that Psiphon produces as it connects, disconnects, etc.

settings#egress-region#select-gb.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. If selected, a Psiphon server in the UK will be used.

settings#upstream-proxy#hostname-label.description: Label for the text box where the user can set the hostname for the 'upstream proxy'. 'Hostname' means approximately the same thing as 'server network name or identifier'.

feedback#smiley_sad.message: سایفون معمولا وصل نمیشود و خوب کار نمیکند.
feedback#smiley_sad.description: The text below the 'sad face' feedback choice.

settings#egress-region#heading.description: Settings section heading. In this section the user can choose to use a Psiphon server in a specific country/region (or the default, which is just to choose the best/fastest region).

settings#upstream-proxy#by-default.message:
اگر پیش از این در کامپیوترخود پراکسی تنظیم کرده‌اید٬ سایفون به طور پیش فرض آن تنظیمات را برای ایجاد تونل استفاده می‌کند. با وارد کردن یک پراکسی مشخص یا انتخاب گزینه که هیچ «upstream proxy» استفاده نشود٬ شما می‌توانید تنظیمات قبلی را باطل کنید.
فقط پراکسی های HTTP که HTTPS را پشتیبانی میکنند قابل استفاده هستند.
settings#upstream-proxy#by-default.description: Help text indicating the default (and best) configuration and behavior for the 'Upstream Proxy' setting. It also indicates what will happen if the setting is overridden or disabled.

settings#split-tunnel#enable-label.message: وبسایت های داخل کشور من را پراکسی نکن.
settings#split-tunnel#enable-label.description: The label on the checkbox that enables 'Split Tunnel'.

feedback#text_feedback_email_prompt.message: اگر دوست دارید که ما به شما جواب دهیم٬ لطفا ایمیل خود را وارد کنید.
feedback#text_feedback_email_prompt.description: Label for a text field where the user can provide an email address to Psiphon Inc. along with their feedback.

feedback#text_feedback_prompt.message: لطفا نظرهای خود را اینجا وارد کنید:
feedback#text_feedback_prompt.description: Label for a text box where the user can provide a feedback message to Psiphon Inc.

feedback#smiley_happy.message: سایفون به خوبی وصل میشود و کار میکند.
feedback#smiley_happy.description: The text below the 'happy face' feedback choice.

connection#wait-btn.description: Text on the big connection button telling the user to wait while Psiphon tries to disconnect from the network. When this message is shown, the button is disabled.

settings#transport-mode#help-text.message: از وی پی ان IPSec/L2TP ویندوز استفاده می‌کند. این تنظیم تمام ترافیک برنامه های شما را تونل می‌کند ولی ترافیک شما را مبهم نمی‌کند. این تنظیم برای عبور از فایروال ها و فیلترینگ پیشنهاد نمی‌شود.
settings#transport-mode#help-text.description: Help text for the 'Use VPN Mode' transport selection checkbox. It gives some technical details and indicates that this mode is not recommended.

settings#egress-region#select-best-perfo.description: One of the choices in the 'Psiphon Server Region' combo box. This is the default option and indicates that Psiphon will use a server in the best/fastest region.

connection#connect-btn.description: Text on the big connection button telling the user that if they click it, Psiphon will start trying to connect to the network. This is shown to the user while Psiphon is disconnected.
